data.discussionTitle: There are many planets that could support life in our universe

side1Sources.title: Drake Equation
side1Sources.quote: Drake equation is a probabilistic argument used to estimate the number of active, communicative extraterrestrial civilizations in the Milky Way Galaxy.

side1Sources.title: A New Empirical Constraint on the Prevalence of Technological Species in the Universe
side1Sources.quote: (Authors) address the cosmic frequency of technological species (utilizing the Drake equation)

side1Sources.title: The Big Bang: What really happened at our universe's birth?
side1Sources.quote: (Idea) that our universe didn't emerge from a single point, or anything like it. Rather, it bounced into expansion … from a pre-existing universe that had been contracting.

side2Sources.title: Fermi Paradox
side2Sources.quote: Fermi's paradox has two components; 1) why haven't the aliens visited us? and 2) why have we not detected their communications/evidence of their energy output?

side2Sources.title: Appeal to Probability
side2Sources.quote: An appeal to probability argues that, because something probably will happen, it is certain to happen.

data.discussionTitle: Cats or Dogs: Which is the Smarter Pet?

side1Sources.title: How Smart are Cats?
side1Sources.quote: ...cats also possess more nerve cells in the visual areas of their brain than humans and most other mammals

side1Sources.title: Just How Smart Are Cats?
side1Sources.quote: ...each part of a cat's brain is compartmentalized, specialized and connected to the others, allowing cats to understand, respond to and even manipulate their surroundings.

side2Sources.title: Are Dogs Smarter Than Cats? Science Has an Answer
side2Sources.quote: A team of researchers counted the number of neurons in dog and cat brains and found one had twice as many as the other.

side2Sources.title: Why scientists believe dogs are smarter than we give them credit for
side2Sources.quote: ...psychologist and dog researcher Stanley Coren estimates, the average dog's intelligence is roughly as sophisticated as a 2.5-year-old baby's.

side1Sources.title: Why are parents banning school books?
side1Sources.quote: Harper Lee's book has been challenged by black parents who object to the use of the …(n-word). It appears 58 times in the book, notes Ms Jones. (testimonies from concerned parents)

side2Sources.title: Banned Books: Reasons Books are Challenged
side2Sources.quote: Many books have been banned or censored in one or more of these categories due to a misjudgment or misunderstanding about the books contents and message (provides stats on challenges)

side2Sources.title: Why are books banned or challenged?
side2Sources.authors: St. Clair County Community College Library
side2Sources.quote: The ALA (American Library Association) condemns censorship and works to ensure free access to information

side1Sources.title: Future is vegan
side1Sources.quote: It has been found that cutting down on meat and dairy products from your diet could reduce an individual’s carbon footprint.

side1Sources.title: 6 Science-Based Health Benefits of Eating Vegan
side1Sources.quote: ...a vegan diet may help you maintain a healthy heart

side2Sources.title: Plant-based diets are best… or are they?
side2Sources.quote: Vegetarians and vegans may have an increased risk of stroke (stats provided)

side2Sources.title: Vegetarianism and veganism compared with mental health and cognitive outcomes: a systematic review and meta-analysis
side2Sources.authors: Isabel Iguacel, Inge Huybrechts, Luis A Moreno, Nathalie Michels
side2Sources.quote: (this study found that) Vegan or vegetarian diets were related to a higher risk of depression and lower anxiety scores
